data.title: Good Food, Great Drinks, Best View, Texas Music, Coolest Staff
data.text: Gotta check out LSA Burger Co when you are in or around the Denton area.  It has the BEST VIEW of Denton Square, and the coolest Texas atmosphere that's great for a night out with friends or even taking the kids.  We LOVE the Stevie Burger, and a side of fries is enough for our family of 4 to share.  The kid's Grilled Cheese is a MUST for the kiddos, but I gotta admit I usually eat about half of it cause its THAT GOOD!  We always start with Chips & Guac & Salsa appetizer because... well, we're TEXANS, it's what we do!!! They've got GREAT Craft Brews, and tons of BEAUTIFULLY AMAZING DRINKS (visitors should try the Margarita Flight to get a taste of all their best Margaritas and because it's SOOO PRETTY).  But my FAVORITE is when the whole Rooftop Bar does a Toast to the AWESOME Texas Sunset at dusk.  Love this PLACE!

data.title: Great hamburger
data.text: Zesty atmosphere with tasty food and craft beers. Menu focuses on hamburgers but we also had a very good green salad.

data.title: Great burgers and superb atmosphere
data.text: Visited for the first time on our recent biennial trip to Texas. Nice part of town great atmosphere around the square. Burgers were great, I had a Stevie the blue cheese one, and the hand cut fries which we shared were delicious. Good choice of beers to compliment the meal. Added to that some good live music featuring a bit of Jackson Browne material, heaven! Looking forward to the next visit in 2018.

data.title: Interesting place/average burgers
data.text: Visited during lunch with friends. Thought the burger (Waylon) was on the dry side. Brisket queso was excellent. Service was a little slow.

data.title: Good music, good food, great atmosphere
data.text: This place is very popular so do make a booking if you want to eat here. We had a variety of burgers and salads, and the parmigiano fries, very good. Did not like the pecan pie and the accompanying ice cream.

data.title: a great Denton Texas Restruant
data.text: a great Denton Texas Restruant I had the our Buddy sandwich very good the music was great I enjoyed seeing the mural on the wall of all the texas music artists selena buddy Holly Stevie Ray Vaughn etc great place to eat in downtown Denton texas a great place

data.title: EAT WITH THE BEST VIEW OF THE DENTON sQUARE
data.text: The food is always good, reasonable, and if you eat on the rooftop floor you get the added bonus of the best view of the Denton Historical Courthouse and Square

data.title: Visiting downtown Denton
data.text: Since I was in the area, and the weather lent itself for an almost outdoor lunch, I decided to visit LSA Burger.  I had the Waylon, which is a plain burger (unless you order the optional cheese), which comes with mayo and or mustard, lettuce, onion, and tomato.  Mine was good, except that it came with mustard which I did not want.  However, it was tasty.  The view, from the third floor, is a plus as it looks over the county courthouse and the immediate area.  It was a bit noisy, but not to a bothersome level.  There are a good number of beers on tap.

data.title: Dinner while on the road
data.text:
In town for a business trip. It was my first time to town and I followed TA reviews to choose to eat here. I was not disappointed. The Stevie burger was great. It was cooked just right, and was the right serving size. I got fries on the side, and they were also very good. The serving on the fries is enough to share. 

The atmosphere is upbeat and high energy. I sat at the bar. There was plenty of elbow room, and the stools are very comfortable. 

It was a bit loud, and if I was with someone else it would have been hard to have a conversation.

data.title: Birthday dinner with friends
data.text:
My friends took me to LSA for my birthday dinner. We had a great dinner and fun evening. 
With the help of our waitress, we ordered drinks. I had a pomegranate sangria (lovely), friend had Crazy Good (she said it really was), other friend had a beer (I don't care for beer, so idk what kind she had). 
I had a Waylon burger (delish basic burger), a friend ordered the Georgie Boy (yummy bacon), other friend ordered the Turkey Bob (she said it was tasty). And we ordered a basket of hand cut fries which were plenty for the three of us with the generous size of the burgers. 
We had the Bourbon pecan pie. OMG! So good with Beth Marie's vanilla ice cream!
Love the beautiful view of downtown Denton from LSA's upper deck. Terrific sunset and a fun evening!

data.title: One of Denton's BEST
data.text: I think we've tried every burger in this exciting, fun restaurant. We have never been disappointed! Also, don't know if we are just lucky or what ... every single server we've had has been just fantastic. Can't recommend it highly enough. And the rooftop area - SUPER cool place to hang out with friends. LOVE THIS PLACE.

data.title: Great Burgers
data.text: Thoroughly enjoyed the variety of burgers. I had the turkey and loved it. Based on my friend's selection, the lamb burger was by far the best. Enjoyed the atmosphere as well.

data.title: Burgers and Brews - & Other good things - On the Town Square in a great College Town
data.text: We visited LSA Burger Company for lunch and were overwhelmed with the selections of foods as well as the various types of beers. Two in our party opted for various burgers (and there were all excellent). I chose the "Boz" (slow cooked brisket with pickles and slaw (on the side)) and my wife ordered the chicken salad. Everything was exceptionally well prepared and tasty.  I did not care for the slaw, but that is just a matter of taste.  Our server (Dillon) was exceptionally helpful and provided some great suggestions on different beers. We got there about 11:30AM on a Saturday and it was not exceptionally crowded.  They have a "roof top" dining area in addition to the downstairs area which helps alleviate congestion and gives folks a choice of dining experience. Overall a very good place on the old town square in a college town. I am glad we got there a bit early - as it began to "fill up" a little after noon.

data.title: Great
data.text: Greatest place to eat young and old.food was great . Staff out standing service great made us feel right at home

data.title: We love this place and you will too
data.text: An amazing crown-jewel of Denton culture and coolness.  You will love the creative burgers and the musical flare of this place.  So glad that these folks decided to invest in our town.  Thank you.

data.title: Amazing burger location
data.text: The rooftop bar area is nothing like you've seen in Denton before. Especially at sunset since they give out a free sample of a local beer which is pretty awesome. The food here is high quality and everything is delicious. The customer service is on point and a very down to earth atmosphere with an amazing view of the downtown Denton square. I always go to visit this place while I'm in town and tell all my friends about it.

data.title: Good food. Good times
data.text: Excellent scratch made burgers,  try 'The Boz' brisket sandwich it is delicious.  Be sure to sit upstairs on the rooftop patio for a great view of the Denton square if the weather is nice

data.title: Great Place
data.text: Excellent burgers and a wide range of choices.  Brisket Queso was surprisingly good.  A first for us.  Come hungry.  Great atmosphere with service to match.  Not a thing to complain about here !

data.title: Always a great time!
data.text: Love the atmosphere at LSA, great music, great food and the rooftop area is very cool. If your in Denton make sure you check it out!

data.title: Raise your voice to talk
data.text: Good food and times for sure but if your looking for a quite night its not here. The food wasn't so good that I would go back. This is more like a look at me place to eat.
